text: "Just Like Fire Would" is a 1986 song by Australian band The Saints. It is the leading single from their seventh studio album All Fools Day and went to number 29 in Australia. It was covered by Bruce Springsteen for his 18th studio album High Hopes and was released as the second single from the album. Category:1986 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Just Like Fire Would
